cab.content: The Coal Controller met the members-of the Executive Committee of the Miners' Federation this afternoon when he increased his previous offer of l/3d. per day for men and 7-^d per day for boys to l/6d S 9d. respectively. This offer the Miners1 Executive will recommend the Conference to accept and they are to convey the decision of foe Con-ference to the Coal Controller tomorrow morning. The Coal Controller is hopeful that this offer will prove acceptable to the Conference.A.H.8.- ' 37.9.17.
